overview: SERGIO, a withdrawn costume designer, accepts being dominant in BDSM encounters with CARMEN, in order to pay for the medical treatment that his mother HELENA needs. These sessions will make him explore the relationship between pain and pleasure, leading him to distance himself from his mother.
